message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.EC. 

The paper deals with incentivizing exploration in a multi-armed bandit setting, which is a classic problem in game theory (cs.GT) and machine learning (cs.AI). The authors propose a policy that maximizes the long-term welfare of a population of agents, which involves optimizing a budget-reward tradeoff (cs.LG). The paper also involves the use of convex optimization to derive the optimal policy, which is a common technique in data science (cs.DS) and economics (cs.EC).
